eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Arizona; AT 02:34 PM ON OCT 11, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:38 PM OCT 12, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. A Safe Alert has been issued for Maricopa County. The Glendale Police Department is looking for 82 year old Robert Bauchman. Robert is a white male, 5 feet 8 inches tall, 175 pounds, with bald head and brown eyes. Robert was last seen wearing a black shirt and unknown-colored shorts. Robert was last seen on 10/10/2025 at 8:00 P.M. leaving his residence near 5100 West Thunderbird Road, driving a gray, 2016, Ford, Edge, with Arizona License Plate 6 6 A 8 0 R. Robert suffers from a medical condition which may cause him to become lost or easily confused. Please contact Glendale Police at 623 930 3000 or call 911 with any information. If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
